data.content:
Trundle (Traditional Trundle)

RP Cost: 520

Release Date: November 30, 2010

Traditional Trundle is a skin for the champion Trundle in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on November 30, 2010, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 520 RP. It offers a unique and classic look for Trundle, showcasing his traditional appearance.

The Traditional Trundle skin gives Trundle a more primitive and rugged appearance, emphasizing his connection to the Freljord and his troll heritage. This skin features Trundle wearing a tattered loincloth, adorned with bones and furs. His skin is covered in tribal tattoos, and he wields a large wooden club as his weapon of choice. The skin also includes new visual effects for Trundle's abilities, adding an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience.

Trundle, the Troll King, is a champion known for his durability and disruptive abilities. He excels at soaking up damage and disrupting the enemy team with his crowd control abilities. Trundle's passive ability, King's Tribute, allows him to heal for a portion of the damage dealt to enemy champions, making him incredibly difficult to kill in extended fights. His Q ability, Chomp, empowers his next basic attack, dealing bonus damage and reducing the attack damage of his target. This ability is particularly effective against tanky champions, as it allows Trundle to steal their stats and become even more durable.

Trundle's W ability, Frozen Domain, creates an area of ice around him, granting him bonus movement speed, attack speed, and healing. This ability is great for engaging or disengaging from fights, as well as sustaining in the jungle. His E ability, Pillar of Ice, creates a pillar at a target location, slowing and disrupting enemies caught in its path. This ability is excellent for setting up ganks or blocking off escape routes. Finally, Trundle's ultimate ability, Subjugate, allows him to drain a percentage of an enemy champion's health and resistances, making him even tankier while weakening his target.

In the lore of League of Legends, Trundle is a troll who hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving region. He was once a member of a tribe known as the Ice Dervishes, but he was cast out due to his disfigurement and disease. Trundle sought a cure for his condition and stumbled upon an ancient artifact known as the

By stealing the artifact, Trundle gained incredible power and became the Troll King.

Trundle's story is one of resilience and survival. Despite being an outcast, he rose to power and became a force to be reckoned with in the Freljord. His strength and durability make him a formidable opponent on the battlefield, and his disruptive abilities can turn the tide of any fight. Trundle's place in the game is as a tanky bruiser, capable of soaking up damage and disrupting the enemy team.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Trundle, including the Traditional Trundle skin. Whether you prefer the classic look or want to explore other options, Trundle offers a variety of skins to suit your taste. So gear up, embrace your troll heritage, and dominate the battlefield as the Troll King himself!

Trundle: The Troll King

Release Date: December 1, 2010

Trundle, the Troll King, is a fearsome champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his unique abilities and intriguing backstory, Trundle has become a favorite among players who enjoy a versatile and strategic playstyle. In this article, we will delve into the depths of Trundle's lore, explore his strengths and weaknesses, and discuss his role in the game.

The Story of Trundle

Trundle hails from the icy Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land where rival tribes constantly vie for power. Born into a tribe of trolls known as the Ruhgosk, Trundle was an outcast due to his sickly appearance and weak stature. Desperate to prove himself, he sought a way to gain strength and dominance over his enemies.

Legend has it that Trundle discovered an ancient and powerful artifact known as the

This relic granted him incredible regenerative abilities, allowing him to absorb the strength and vitality of his foes. With his newfound power, Trundle challenged the current troll king and emerged victorious, earning the title of the Troll King himself.

However, Trundle's reign was not without its challenges. The Ice Witch Lissandra, a powerful and manipulative sorceress, sought to unite the Freljord under her rule. Recognizing Trundle as a threat, she cursed him, causing his flesh to decay and wither. Despite this setback, Trundle remained determined to protect his tribe and reclaim his former glory.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Trundle's unique abilities make him a formidable champion on the battlefield. His passive ability, King's Tribute, grants him increased health regeneration whenever he damages an enemy champion. This allows Trundle to sustain himself during fights and stay in the thick of the action for longer periods.

One of Trundle's most iconic abilities is his Q, Chomp. When activated, Trundle bites his target, dealing damage and stealing a portion of their attack damage. This ability not only allows Trundle to deal significant damage to his opponents but also weakens their offensive capabilities, making him a formidable duelist.

Trundle's W, Frozen Domain, creates a zone of ice around him, granting him increased movement speed, attack speed, and healing. This ability not only enhances Trundle's mobility but also provides him with additional sustain, making him a resilient and hard-to-kill champion.

His E, Pillar of Ice, is a versatile ability that can be used for both offensive and defensive purposes. Trundle summons a massive pillar of ice, slowing and displacing enemies caught in its path. This ability can be used to initiate fights, separate enemies from their team, or even block off escape routes, making it a valuable tool in Trundle's arsenal.

Finally, Trundle's ultimate ability, Subjugate, is a game-changer. When cast on an enemy champion, Trundle steals a percentage of their health, armor, and magic resist, transferring it to himself. This ability not only weakens the target but also makes Trundle significantly tankier, allowing him to soak up damage and disrupt the enemy team.

Despite his strengths, Trundle does have some weaknesses. He lacks long-range abilities, making it difficult for him to engage or poke enemies from a distance. Additionally, his reliance on melee attacks puts him at risk of being kited or burst down by champions with high mobility or burst damage. However, with proper positioning and strategic play, Trundle can overcome these weaknesses and become a force to be reckoned with.

Trundle's Place in the Game

Trundle is primarily played as a top laner in League of Legends. His tankiness, sustain, and ability to disrupt enemy formations make him a strong pick for teams looking to engage in team fights and control objectives. Trundle's ultimate ability, Subjugate, also makes him an excellent counter to tanky champions, as he can steal their defensive stats and render them vulnerable.

Furthermore, Trundle's versatility allows him to adapt to different playstyles and team compositions. He can be built as a tank, focusing on soaking up damage and disrupting the enemy team, or as a bruiser, dealing significant damage while still maintaining some tankiness. This flexibility makes Trundle a valuable asset to any team, as he can fulfill multiple roles depending on the needs of the game.

On the website developed for the League of Legends game, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Trundle's skins. From the classic Troll King to the fearsome Worldbreaker, each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience, allowing players to customize their champion to their liking.

In conclusion, Trundle, the Troll King, is a versatile and powerful champion in League of Legends. With his regenerative abilities, disruptive crowd control, and ability to steal defensive stats, Trundle can turn the tide of battles and dominate the top lane. Whether you prefer to play as a tank or a bruiser, Trundle offers a unique and enjoyable playstyle that is sure to captivate players. So, gather your strength, embrace your inner troll, and join Trundle on his quest for dominance in the icy lands of the Freljord.

Trundle (Constable Trundle)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: March 5, 2015

Trundle, the Troll King, is known for his intimidating presence and his ability to steal the strength of his enemies. With his new skin, Constable Trundle, he takes on a whole new persona as a law enforcement officer in the world of League of Legends. This skin offers players a unique and comical twist on Trundle's character, transforming him into a troll cop who is ready to enforce the law.

Constable Trundle is dressed in a traditional police uniform, complete with a blue shirt, black pants, and a police hat. He carries a large wooden club, which he uses to maintain order on the battlefield. His abilities also receive a thematic makeover, with his Q ability, Chomp, turning into a bite from his trusty police dog, and his W ability, Frozen Domain, creating a police barricade. His ultimate ability, Subjugate, transforms his target into a handcuffed criminal, symbolizing his authority over his enemies.

This skin offers a fresh and humorous take on Trundle's character, adding a touch of lightheartedness to the game. It is a great choice for players who enjoy playing Trundle and want to add some fun to their gameplay experience.

The Story of Trundle

Trundle, the Troll King, is a champion in the game League of Legends. He hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land filled with warring tribes and ancient magic. Trundle was once a member of one of these tribes, but he was cast out and left to die due to his disfigurement and his ability to spread disease.

However, Trundle's story took a turn when he encountered the legendary troll, Lissandra. She offered him a deal: if he helped her defeat her enemies, she would grant him the power to become the true Troll King. Trundle agreed, and with Lissandra's magic, he gained incredible strength and the ability to steal the life force of his enemies.

With his newfound power, Trundle returned to his tribe and reclaimed his position as their leader. He became known as the Troll King, ruling with an iron fist and using his abilities to protect his people. However, Trundle's reign was not without its challenges. He faced opposition from other tribes and even from within his own ranks.

Despite the hardships, Trundle remained a formidable force on the battlefield. His ability to steal the strength of his enemies made him a fearsome opponent, and his resilience allowed him to withstand even the most powerful attacks. Trundle's presence on the battlefield was always felt, as he towered over his enemies and struck fear into their hearts.

In the world of League of Legends, Trundle is a versatile champion who can fulfill multiple roles. He is often played as a top laner, where his tankiness and sustain make him a formidable opponent. His ability to steal the stats of his enemies also makes him a strong pick against tanky champions, as he can reduce their effectiveness and turn the tide of battle in his favor.

Trundle's strengths lie in his ability to sustain himself in fights and his ability to disrupt the enemy team. His passive ability, King's Tribute, allows him to heal for a portion of the damage he deals, making him difficult to kill. His Q ability, Chomp, not only deals damage but also reduces the attack damage of his target, further weakening his enemies. His W ability, Frozen Domain, provides him with increased movement speed and healing, allowing him to chase down enemies or escape from dangerous situations. His ultimate ability, Subjugate, steals a portion of his target's health and increases Trundle's own stats, making him even more powerful in fights.

However, Trundle also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He lacks mobility, which makes him vulnerable to champions with high burst damage or crowd control abilities. Additionally, his abilities require him to be in close range of his enemies, which can put him at risk in team fights. Trundle's ultimate ability, while powerful, can be countered by healing reduction effects, so it is important for players to time it correctly and choose their targets wisely.

Overall, Trundle is a unique and powerful champion in the world of League of Legends. His story of redemption and his ability to steal the strength of his enemies make him a compelling character to play. Whether you're a fan of his lore or simply enjoy his gameplay style, Trundle is a champion worth exploring.

For more information about Trundle and to see all of his appearances in the game, including the Constable Trundle skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to this lovable troll.

Trundle (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Trundle, the Troll King, is a fearsome champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his brute strength and relentless nature, Trundle has become a fan favorite among players. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Trundle's default skin and explore all the intricate details of this iconic costume.

The Story of Trundle's Default Skin

Trundle's default skin represents his original appearance when he was first introduced to the League of Legends universe. As the Troll King, Trundle embodies the essence of a powerful and menacing troll, with his hulking physique and rugged features. His default skin showcases his raw strength and primal nature, making him a formidable force on the battlefield.

The default skin features Trundle wearing tattered clothing, adorned with bones and other tribal accessories. His skin is a sickly green color, reflecting his troll heritage. Trundle's weapon of choice is a massive club, which he wields with ease to crush his enemies. The attention to detail in his default skin is remarkable, with intricate textures and designs that bring out the essence of his character.

One notable aspect of Trundle's default skin is his unique visual effects. When using his abilities, Trundle leaves a trail of icy particles, symbolizing his connection to the frozen lands he hails from. These visual effects add an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience, making Trundle's abilities feel even more impactful.

The Story of Trundle

Trundle's story within the League of Legends universe is a captivating one. Hailing from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving region, Trundle was once a lowly troll living in the shadow of his more powerful brethren. However, his desire for strength and dominance led him to make a fateful decision.

In his quest for power, Trundle sought out the legendary weapon known as the

This weapon possessed immense magical properties and was said to grant its wielder unparalleled strength. Trundle's determination and cunning allowed him to claim the Boneshiver for himself, transforming him into the fearsome Troll King we know today.

With his newfound power, Trundle set out to unite the scattered troll tribes under his rule. He believed that by consolidating their strength, the trolls could rise above their current state of weakness and become a force to be reckoned with. Trundle's leadership and charisma allowed him to achieve this goal, earning him the respect and loyalty of his fellow trolls.

In the League of Legends, Trundle's role is that of a tanky bruiser. His abilities are centered around crowd control and sustain, making him a formidable frontline champion. Trundle's passive ability,

allows him to heal for a portion of the damage he deals to enemy champions, making him difficult to take down in extended fights.

One of Trundle's signature abilities is his
which creates a massive ice pillar that slows and disrupts enemy movement. This ability is particularly useful for setting up ganks or blocking off escape routes. Trundle's ultimate ability,

steals a portion of an enemy champion's health, making him even tankier while weakening his target.

Trundle's strengths lie in his ability to sustain through fights and disrupt the enemy team. His tankiness and crowd control make him an excellent choice for engaging team fights and protecting his allies. However, Trundle's lack of mobility and range can make him vulnerable to champions who can kite him or poke from a distance.

Explore Trundle's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Trundle's various appearances and skins, you can find detailed information and videos on our dedicated Trundle page. From his classic default skin to his more extravagant alternate costumes, Trundle's appearances offer a wide range of visual styles to suit every player's taste.

Whether you prefer the rugged and primal look of his default skin or the flashy and unique designs of his alternate skins, Trundle's appearances are sure to impress. Each skin brings its own flair and personality to the champion, allowing players to express their individuality while dominating the battlefield.

In conclusion, Trundle's default skin is a testament to his raw power and primal nature. With its attention to detail and unique visual effects, the default skin truly captures the essence of the Troll King. Whether you choose to stick with the default skin or explore Trundle's alternate appearances, one thing is certain - Trundle is a force to be reckoned with on the Fields of Justice.

Trundle (Fright Night Trundle)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: October 29, 2012

Trundle, the Troll King, is known for his intimidating presence and his ability to dominate the battlefield. With his Fright Night Trundle skin, he takes on a spooky and chilling appearance, perfect for the Halloween season. This skin transforms Trundle into a fearsome creature of the night, complete with haunting visuals and bone-chilling abilities.

The Fright Night Trundle skin features a complete overhaul of Trundle's appearance, giving him a more sinister and eerie look. His troll-like features are enhanced with pale blue skin, glowing yellow eyes, and a menacing grin. He wears tattered and torn clothing, adorned with bones and skulls, adding to his terrifying presence. The skin also includes unique visual effects, such as ghostly particles and eerie green trails, which add to the overall spooky atmosphere.

Not only does Fright Night Trundle change Trundle's appearance, but it also alters his abilities to match the theme. His Q ability, Chomp, now features a ghostly green effect when he bites down on his enemies. His W ability, Frozen Domain, creates a chilling mist that surrounds him, leaving a trail of ghostly footprints as he moves. His E ability, Pillar of Ice, summons a spectral pillar that rises from the ground, freezing enemies in fear. Finally, his ultimate ability, Subjugate, transforms his target into a ghostly figure, draining their life force and empowering Trundle.

Trundle's Fright Night skin is a perfect addition to any player's collection, especially for those who enjoy the Halloween season. It offers a unique and chilling twist on Trundle's character, allowing players to stand out on the battlefield with their spooky presence. Whether you're a fan of Trundle or simply enjoy collecting skins, Fright Night Trundle is a must-have for any League of Legends player.

Trundle: The Troll King

Trundle, also known as the Troll King, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. He is a melee fighter who excels at disrupting his enemies and stealing their defensive stats. Trundle's unique abilities and playstyle make him a formidable force on the battlefield.

Trundle's story in the game revolves around his quest for power and dominance. Once a lowly troll, he sought to become the ruler of all trolls. In his pursuit of power, he encountered the Ice Witch Lissandra, who offered him a deal. In exchange for his loyalty, she granted him the power to control ice and granted him the title of Troll King.

Trundle's strengths lie in his ability to sustain himself in fights and disrupt his enemies. His passive ability, King's Tribute, allows him to heal for a portion of the damage he deals to enemy champions. This makes him incredibly durable in prolonged engagements. His Q ability, Chomp, empowers his next basic attack, dealing bonus damage and reducing the attack damage of his target. This ability is great for trading blows with enemy champions and reducing their damage output.

Trundle's W ability, Frozen Domain, creates an area of ice around him, granting him bonus movement speed, attack speed, and healing. This ability allows him to chase down enemies or escape from dangerous situations. His E ability, Pillar of Ice, summons a pillar from the ground, slowing and displacing enemies caught in its path. This ability is excellent for setting up ganks or blocking off escape routes.

Finally, Trundle's ultimate ability, Subjugate, is a powerful tool for turning the tide of a fight. When cast on an enemy champion, Trundle steals a portion of their health, armor, and magic resist, while also gaining bonus stats for himself. This ability can quickly turn a tanky enemy into a vulnerable target, allowing Trundle and his team to secure a kill.

Trundle's weaknesses lie in his lack of mobility and range. He relies on getting up close and personal with his enemies to deal damage and disrupt their defenses. This makes him vulnerable to kiting and poke champions who can keep their distance. Additionally, Trundle's abilities are primarily focused on single-target damage and crowd control, making him less effective against groups of enemies.

In the world of League of Legends, Trundle has found his place as a strong pick in the top lane. His sustain and dueling potential make him a formidable opponent against other melee champions. He can also be played as a jungler, utilizing his Pillar of Ice to set up ganks and control objectives.

Overall, Trundle is a versatile champion with a unique playstyle. His Fright Night Trundle skin adds an extra layer of excitement and spookiness to his character, making him a standout choice for players who enjoy the Halloween season. Whether you're a fan of Trundle's lore or simply enjoy his playstyle, Fright Night Trundle is a skin worth adding to your collection.

For more information about Trundle and his various appearances, including videos showcasing his abilities and skins, be sure to visit our page dedicated to the Troll King.

Trundle (Junkyard Trundle)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2012

Trundle, the Troll King, is known for his intimidating presence and his ability to dominate the battlefield. With his unique appearance and powerful abilities, he has become a fan-favorite champion in the popular game League of Legends. One of Trundle's most iconic skins is

which adds a gritty and rugged twist to his already fearsome persona.

Released on November 29, 2012, the Junkyard Trundle skin is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. This skin transforms Trundle into a post-apocalyptic scavenger, complete with a makeshift weapon and a raggedy outfit. The skin's design perfectly captures the essence of a troll surviving in a desolate wasteland, making it a must-have for Trundle enthusiasts.

The Junkyard Trundle skin features several unique visual and audio effects that enhance the overall gaming experience. Trundle's abilities are given a rusty and worn-out appearance, with his Q ability,
showcasing a jagged metal jaw that tears through his enemies. His W ability,
creates a decaying ground effect, symbolizing the desolation of the junkyard. Additionally, his ultimate ability,

is accompanied by a distinct sound effect, emphasizing the power and dominance of the Troll King.

Trundle's story within the League of Legends universe is one of resilience and strength. Originally a humble troll living in the Freljord, Trundle was plagued by a debilitating disease that weakened his body. Desperate for a cure, he sought out the legendary Ice Witch, Lissandra, who promised him a solution in exchange for his loyalty. However, Trundle soon realized that Lissandra's intentions were far from noble, and he rebelled against her control.

With his newfound power and determination, Trundle became a champion of the Freljord, leading his fellow trolls in a rebellion against Lissandra and her Frostguard. His abilities, such as his Q ability
which allows him to bite his enemies and steal their attack damage, and his ultimate ability

which drains the life force of his foes, make him a formidable force on the battlefield.

Trundle's unique playstyle revolves around his ability to disrupt enemy formations and sustain himself in fights. His passive ability,
grants him health regeneration whenever an enemy unit dies nearby, allowing him to stay in the thick of battle for extended periods. Additionally, his W ability,

creates an area of effect that grants him increased movement speed and healing, making him difficult to catch or escape from.

While Trundle possesses many strengths, he also has his fair share of weaknesses. His lack of long-range abilities makes him vulnerable to poke and kiting from ranged champions. Additionally, his reliance on melee attacks puts him at a disadvantage against champions with strong crowd control abilities. However, with proper positioning and strategic use of his abilities, Trundle can overcome these weaknesses and become a formidable force on the battlefield.

Trundle's place in the game is that of a versatile bruiser who excels in disrupting enemy formations and sustaining himself in fights. His ability to steal attack damage and drain the life force of his enemies makes him a potent threat against tanky champions. Additionally, his ultimate ability,

allows him to steal a percentage of his target's health, making him a valuable asset in team fights.

On this page, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Trundle's appearances, including the Junkyard Trundle skin. Whether you're a fan of his classic troll look or prefer the rugged aesthetic of the Junkyard Trundle skin, there's no shortage of options to choose from when it comes to customizing your favorite champion.

Trundle (Lil' Slugger Trundle)

RP Cost: 975 RP | Release Date: May 23, 2011

Trundle, the Troll King, is known for his intimidating presence and powerful abilities on the Fields of Justice. However, there is one skin that showcases a different side of this fearsome champion - Lil' Slugger Trundle. This skin transforms Trundle into a baseball player, complete with a baseball bat as his weapon of choice. Let's dive into the story behind this unique costume and explore all the details of Lil' Slugger Trundle.

Lil' Slugger Trundle is a skin that was released on May 23, 2011, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP. This skin gives Trundle a complete makeover, turning him into a baseball player ready to knock his enemies out of the park. With his baseball bat in hand, Trundle is ready to swing for the fences and bring victory to his team.

The skin features Trundle wearing a baseball uniform, complete with a cap and jersey adorned with the number 5. His weapon, the traditional club he wields in his classic skin, is replaced with a baseball bat, adding a playful twist to his abilities. When Trundle uses his Q ability, Chomp, he takes a swing with his bat, delivering a powerful blow to his enemies. His W ability, Frozen Domain, creates a baseball diamond-shaped area on the ground, further emphasizing the theme of the skin. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Subjugate, transforms his target into a baseball, making them easier to hit out of the park.

Now that we've explored the details of Lil' Slugger Trundle, let's take a moment to delve into the story of Trundle himself. Trundle is a champion in League of Legends who hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land. He is a troll, a race known for their brute strength and resilience. Trundle's appearance is unique among trolls, as he has been infected with a mysterious disease known as the

This disease has caused his flesh to decay, giving him a grotesque and intimidating appearance.

In the game, Trundle is a versatile champion who excels at disrupting his enemies and sustaining himself in battle. His passive ability, King's Tribute, allows him to heal for a portion of the damage he deals to enemy champions, making him difficult to take down. His Q ability, Chomp, empowers his next basic attack, dealing bonus damage and briefly increasing his attack damage. This ability is particularly effective against tanky champions, as it reduces their armor and magic resist. Trundle's W ability, Frozen Domain, creates an area of ice around him, granting him bonus movement speed, attack speed, and healing. This ability is great for engaging or disengaging from fights, as well as sustaining himself in the jungle. His E ability, Pillar of Ice, creates a pillar that slows and displaces enemies, making it an excellent tool for crowd control. Finally, Trundle's ultimate ability, Subjugate, steals a percentage of his target's health, making him tankier and weakening his opponent.

Trundle's story in the game revolves around his desire to reclaim his homeland, which has been taken over by the Ice Witch, Lissandra. He seeks to unite the warring tribes of the Freljord and restore balance to the land. Trundle's journey is one of resilience and determination, as he fights against all odds to reclaim what is rightfully his.

If you're interested in learning more about Trundle and his various appearances in League of Legends, you can find information and videos on this page. Whether you prefer the classic Trundle or the playful Lil' Slugger Trundle, there's no denying the power and presence of the Troll King on the Fields of Justice.

Trundle (Worldbreaker Trundle)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: March 2, 2017

Trundle, the Troll King, is known for his menacing presence and his ability to dominate the battlefield. With his Worldbreaker Trundle skin, he takes on an even more fearsome appearance, embodying the destructive force of nature itself. This skin is a part of the Worldbreaker series, which features champions who have been transformed into powerful beings that can reshape the world.

Worldbreaker Trundle is a legendary skin that costs 1350 RP, offering players a unique and visually stunning experience. Released on March 2, 2017, this skin has quickly become a favorite among Trundle enthusiasts, as it showcases the champion's raw power and primal nature.

The Worldbreaker Trundle skin completely transforms the Troll King's appearance, giving him a more imposing and intimidating presence on the battlefield. Trundle's usual ragged clothing is replaced with armor made from the bones of fallen creatures, emphasizing his connection to the natural world. His weapon, a massive stone club, is adorned with spikes and runes, further enhancing his destructive capabilities.

One of the most striking features of the Worldbreaker Trundle skin is his glowing blue eyes, which emit an otherworldly aura. This detail adds an extra layer of menace to his already formidable presence, making him a truly fearsome sight to behold.

In addition to the visual changes, the Worldbreaker Trundle skin also includes new animations and sound effects. Trundle's abilities have been modified to match his new appearance, creating a more immersive gameplay experience. From his devastating Q ability, Chomp, to his powerful R ability, Subjugate, every aspect of Trundle's kit has been reimagined to fit the theme of the Worldbreaker series.

Trundle, the Troll King, has a rich and intriguing backstory within the world of League of Legends. Hailing from the icy Freljord, Trundle was once a lowly troll who was constantly bullied and oppressed by other tribes. However, his tenacity and cunning allowed him to rise to power and become the leader of his own tribe, known as the Iceborn.

Trundle's strength lies in his ability to drain the life force of his enemies, sapping their strength and bolstering his own. His Q ability, Chomp, allows him to bite down on his enemies, dealing damage and stealing their attack damage. This ability not only deals significant damage but also reduces the attack damage of his target, making Trundle a formidable duelist.

Another key aspect of Trundle's kit is his W ability, Frozen Domain. This ability creates a zone of ice around Trundle, granting him increased movement speed, attack speed, and healing. This makes Trundle incredibly difficult to catch and kill, as he can quickly maneuver around the battlefield and sustain himself in fights.

Trundle's E ability, Pillar of Ice, is a versatile crowd control tool that can be used to disrupt enemy movements and create opportunities for his team. By summoning a massive pillar of ice, Trundle can block off paths, separate enemies, and even interrupt channels or dashes. This ability is crucial for setting up kills and controlling the flow of team fights.

Finally, Trundle's ultimate ability, Subjugate, is a powerful tool that allows him to drain the life force of a target enemy champion. By casting this ability on an enemy, Trundle steals a percentage of their health, armor, and magic resist, instantly making himself tankier and weakening his opponent. This ability can turn the tide of a fight and allow Trundle to survive even the most dire situations.

In the world of League of Legends, Trundle is often seen as a niche pick, excelling in certain matchups and team compositions. His ability to drain the stats of his enemies makes him a strong pick against tanky champions, as he can reduce their defenses and become an unkillable force. Additionally, his crowd control and mobility make him a valuable asset in team fights, where he can disrupt enemy formations and protect his carries.

Overall, Trundle is a champion with a unique playstyle and a rich lore that adds depth to his character. Whether you're a fan of his Worldbreaker skin or simply interested in learning more about his abilities and story, this page provides a comprehensive resource for all things Trundle. Explore the videos and information available to fully immerse yourself in the world of the Troll King.

Trundle (Dragonslayer Trundle)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: March 5, 2015

Dragonslayer Trundle is a fearsome skin that transforms the Troll King into a formidable dragonslayer. Released on March 5, 2015, this skin is part of the Dragonslayer skin line, which features champions who have taken up arms against the mighty dragons of Runeterra. With its unique design and thematic abilities, Dragonslayer Trundle offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience the champion.

As the name suggests, Dragonslayer Trundle is inspired by the legendary dragon hunters of Runeterra. The skin features Trundle clad in heavy armor adorned with dragon motifs, wielding a massive spiked club that resembles a dragon's tail. His abilities also receive a thematic overhaul, with icy blue effects and dragon-inspired visuals that add a touch of ferocity to his already intimidating presence.

Let's take a closer look at the details of Dragonslayer Trundle's appearance:

Splash Art

The splash art for Dragonslayer Trundle showcases the champion in all his glory. Standing atop a rocky outcrop, Trundle is depicted mid-swing, bringing down his massive club upon a fearsome dragon. The attention to detail is remarkable, with every scale and wrinkle on the dragon's body meticulously rendered. The background features a desolate landscape, hinting at the epic battles Trundle has fought in his quest to slay dragons.

In-Game Model

In-game, Dragonslayer Trundle's model is a sight to behold. The heavy armor he wears is intricately designed, with dragon-scale patterns and spikes that give him a menacing appearance. His club, fashioned from a dragon's tail, is a testament to his strength and determination. The icy blue effects that accompany his abilities further enhance the dragon-slaying theme, making every ability cast feel impactful and powerful.

Abilities

Dragonslayer Trundle's abilities receive a thematic overhaul to match his new appearance. Here's a breakdown of his dragon-inspired abilities:

Passive - King's Tribute

Trundle's passive ability remains unchanged in the Dragonslayer skin. King's Tribute allows Trundle to heal for a percentage of the damage dealt by his basic attacks, empowering him to sustain in battles and stay on the front lines.

Q - Chomp

Chomp, Trundle's Q ability, gains a new visual effect in the Dragonslayer skin. When activated, Trundle's club glows with a blue flame, adding an extra layer of dragon-themed flair to his devastating bite.

W - Frozen Domain

Frozen Domain, Trundle's W ability, receives a visual update in the Dragonslayer skin. The icy blue aura that surrounds Trundle when he activates this ability now takes on a more dragon-like appearance, with swirling patterns reminiscent of dragon scales.

E - Pillar of Ice

Pillar of Ice, Trundle's E ability, undergoes a transformation in the Dragonslayer skin. Instead of a regular pillar of ice, Trundle summons a massive dragon's tooth from the ground, adding an extra touch of dragon-themed magic to his crowd control ability.

R - Subjugate

Subjugate, Trundle's ultimate ability, remains visually similar in the Dragonslayer skin. However, the icy blue effects that surround the target now take on a more intense and menacing appearance, reflecting Trundle's dragon-slaying prowess.

Now that we've explored the details of Dragonslayer Trundle's appearance, let's delve into the lore and background of Trundle himself.

Trundle's Story

Trundle, the Troll King, is a champion known for his resilience and cunning. Hailing from the Freljord, Trundle was once a lowly troll who lived in the shadow of the mighty Iceborn warriors. However, his desire for power and dominance led him to strike a deal with a mysterious entity known as the Ice Witch.

Through the Ice Witch's dark magic, Trundle gained incredible strength and the ability to infect others with a debilitating disease. With his newfound power, Trundle challenged the Iceborn and claimed the title of Troll King, ruling over his fellow trolls with an iron fist.

Despite his newfound power, Trundle's reign was not without challenges. The dragons of Runeterra, ancient and powerful creatures, posed a constant threat to his rule. Determined to protect his kingdom and assert his dominance, Trundle took up arms against the dragons, becoming a fearsome dragonslayer.

Trundle's story is one of resilience and defiance. He embodies the spirit of the underdog, rising from obscurity to become a force to be reckoned with. His unique abilities and playstyle make him a versatile champion, capable of disrupting enemy formations and sustaining through battles.

In the world of League of Legends, Trundle finds his place as a top lane bruiser. His tankiness and sustain make him a formidable opponent in one-on-one duels, while his crowd control abilities allow him to disrupt teamfights and protect his allies. Trundle's ultimate ability, Subjugate, also makes him a potent tank shredder, allowing him to steal a percentage of an enemy's health and resistances.

Whether you're a fan of Trundle's lore or a player looking to master the Troll King, this page provides a comprehensive resource for all things Trundle. Here, you can find information about his various skins, including Dragonslayer Trundle, as well as videos showcasing his abilities and gameplay.

So, dive into the world of Trundle and discover the power of the Troll King. Unleash your inner dragonslayer and dominate the Rift with Dragonslayer Trundle!
